plays.text: Penalty to Zdeno Chara 2 minutes for Hooking Luc Robitaille
Goal scored by Martin Havlat unassisted
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for Tripping Marian Hossa served by Boyd Devereaux
Goal scored by Pavel Datsyuk assisted by Boyd Devereaux
Penalty to Bill Muckalt 2 minutes for Roughing Darren McCarty
Penalty to Tomas Holmstrom 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Radek Bonk
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for High Sticking Daniel Alfredsson
Penalty to Shawn McEachern 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Kirk Maltby
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Boyd Devereaux
Goal scored by Martin Havlat assisted by Karel Rachunek and Radek Bonk
Penalty to Chris Neil 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Igor Larionov
Goal scored by Luc Robitaille assisted by Kirk Maltby and Sergei Fedorov
Penalty to Kris Draper 2 minutes for Roughing Karel Rachunek
Penalty to Wade Redden 2 minutes for Interference Kris Draper
Penalty to Igor Larionov 2 minutes for Slashing Marian Hossa
Goal scored by Mathieu Dandenault assisted by Igor Larionov and Steve Yzerman
